data.text: @AHS_media I sincerely hope you are sued into oblivion.

@AHS_media @AHS MEDIA.
Read the affidavits from two senior Alberta Midwives that have the lab reports (I have them too as I filed these in court).
https://t.co/euS8wKOnap

https://t.co/YNLhUH1q2T

@logosaetos @AHS_media @dksdata For years, people like you gaslighted the mothers & enabled the immoral PharmaCo by saying inane things like “there is no peer reviewed study”.

Look at the data, Nikki. C19 vaxxes are unsafe & ineffective. Logic demands extreme caution before pushing pregnant women to take them.

@logosaetos @AHS_media @dksdata Sweetheart, for years there were no peer reviewed papers proving kids were being born with horrific deformities caused by Thalidomide.

There were just the facts: lots of deformed kids sentenced to a life of pain bc of the immoral greed of the pharmaceuticals company.

@logosaetos @C10Bill @AHS_media Really again? And yes I (and AHS) have copies of the full reports.
https://t.co/YNLhUH1q2T
@C10Bill @AHS_media @dksdata I can, but you can’t produce a peer reviewed study stating the vaccines cause any issues for those who are pregnant.
@logosaetos @AHS_media @dksdata Can you produce a logical thought?
